name: Run_scripts on Add to quote
action:
<* ExecuteScript(PS_C300_UMC_Parts)*>
<* ExecuteScript(C300_shipping_crate_parts_RG)*>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_SerC_C300_RG_Parts_2)*>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_C300_CNM_PartCals)*>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_mcar_part_add_RG)*>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_RG_label_parts)*>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_SerC_C300_RG_Parts)*>
<* ExecuteScript(SerC_PowerSupply_Parts)*>
<*CTX( Container(Series_C_RG_Part_Summary_Cont).LoadKeys(PartNumber).Load(select '<*Eval(Replace("<*VALUE(Series_C_RG_Part_Summary)*>",", ","' as PartNumber UNION SELECT '"))*>' as PartNumber   ) )*>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_C300_UMC_Parts)*>
<* ExecuteScript(C300_shipping_crate_parts_RG)*>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_SerC_C300_RG_Parts_2)*>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_C300_CNM_PartCals)*>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_mcar_part_add_RG)*>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_RG_label_parts)*>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_SerC_C300_RG_Parts)*>
<* ExecuteScript(SerC_PowerSupply_Parts)*>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_ScriptOnAddtoQuote)*>
<*CTX( Container(Series_C_RG_Part_Summary_Cont).LoadKeys(PartNumber).Load(select '<*Eval(Replace("<*VALUE(Series_C_RG_Part_Summary)*>",", ","' as PartNumber UNION SELECT '"))*>' as PartNumber   ) )*>
